name: Black Swans of Venus
description: Black Swans of Venus is a short text-based adventure built for Game World Creation (GAME 134) at JCCC.  Choose well and you will do well.  Choose poorly and you will die.  Venus is a dangerous place, and there's something going on at the Puerto Vargas mining outpost that has made it even more dangerous.  Floating in the upper atmosphere of Venus, Puerto Vargas is the Venusian headquarters for Vargas Mining S.A.  It has been one of the more secure and peaceful outposts on Venus, but a string of mysterious deaths threaten to change that.  Your job is to solve the mystery and prevent corporate warfare between Puerto Vargas and its rival, Junction Salvage.
